title: Configure qTest integration in Katalon Studio
description: Katalon Studio allows you to integrate with qTest. This integration allows you to:Submit test results automatically and manually from Katalon Studio to qTest.Generate Katalon Studio - qTest parity reports.Manage version control between qTest and Katalon Studio.
